title: Just beside the pen in the notification tray, there are some numbers. Not sure what that is...
content: When I scroll down the notification tray twice, there's a pen icon on the bottom left and that is fine. I tapped it and it allowed me to customize/prioritise the notification tray icons. What I don't understand is that there are some numbers just beside the pen icon. I have tried tapping on the numbers but nothing happened.
